post.body: for psoriatic arthritis
of course she is;)
juan wrote that on my phone... Of course I remember Ryan was there:)
you should have heard them on the strategy room..."casting crows"
I should say the good oldies... The other station is playing stuff like hall and Oates and usher.
xm has 2 holiday stations... I've been listening to the one that was called cinemagic. It's called holiday traditions now-Oldies
On my way to walmart cuz Rory is already sick and coughing... Awesome New Years!
Everything looks good... No bad reaction yay!
Well I just shot myself for the first time. I did good but it hurt more than I thought it would. Now to sit for 20 min to see what happens
Going to the doc 2 learn how 2 do my 1st injection..this is the pen...it's probably good that I can't see the needle http://twitpic.com/xyej
Is that not the sweetest thing? http://twitpic.com/xw4q
Jesse got a mic that goes thru FM radio for Christmas and he is singin Ave Maria...Well ok just yelling and laughing http://twitpic.com/xnng
My whole family was at the house yesterday and they held Rory all day. Needless to say her nights and days are now backwards! Ahhhhh!
I know, i know it's probably just gas but i choose to believe it's for real. http://twitpic.com/x4rw
Our boy is already hooked on the IPhone... He was tweeting. http://twitpic.com/x4qf
Just just finished Christmas cards... It's only the day after Christmas:)
Aww... Christmas is perfect! http://twitpic.com/wbx5
Having a hard time walking today but on the way to the doctor to learn how to give myself shots. I'll take a pic of the needle for erbody;)
Went to a Jags game las night and had Christmas with Juan's family this morning. Uncle Jake and Aunt Kelly got this.http://twitpic.com/u9zy
Ok... Mark just wiped something off of Juan's shoulder and then found that it could possibly be a booger. We just don't know whose.
